entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is mentioned as seeing the blurred outlines of Fred and George leaping down from Ron's bed.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as sitting next to Ron and discussing a mysterious weapon.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as sitting near Harry's feet and asking if they have found the mysterious weapon yet.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as having a bed that Fred and George leaped down from.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the one who mentioned a mysterious weapon.

entities.name: avada kedavra curse
entities.description: The Avada Kedavra curse is mentioned as being worse than death.

entities.name: cruciatus curse
entities.description: The Cruciatus Curse is mentioned as a way of causing pain.
